scripts.db:reset: env $(cat .env) npx sequelize-cli db:drop && env $(cat .env) npx sequelize-cli db:create && env $(cat .env) npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && env $(cat .env) npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:start: env $(cat .env) npx sequelize-cli db:create && env $(cat .env) npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && env $(cat .env) npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
